languages.text: "Сестрица, тебе тогда тоже глазки выковырять не помешало бы, а то видения у тебя какие-то не те. Мне вот мои шепотки совсем другое говорят о том, кто и как тут помрет. Не буду портить сюрприз, но скажем так — для тебя это будет настоящим шоком". {n}Идира недобро ухмыляется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Сестрица, тебе тогда тоже глазки выковырять не помешало бы, а то видения у тебя какие-то не те. Мне вот мои шепотки совсем другое говорят о том, кто и как тут помрет. Не буду портить сюрприз, но скажем так — для тебя это будет настоящим шоком". {n}Идира недобро ухмыляется.{/n}

languages.text: "In that case you should consider losing the eyes too, sister, 'cause your visions are all wrong. My whispers are telling me something completely different about who dies here and how. I won't spoil the surprise, so let's just say it will come as quite a shock to you." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n}

Не буду портить сюрприз, но скажем так — для тебя это будет настоящим шоком". {n}Идира недобро ухмыляется.{/n}

I won't spoil the surprise, so let's just say it will come as quite a shock to you." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n}

languages.text: "Dann solltet Ihr überlegen, auch die Augen loszuwerden, Schwester, Eure Visionen sind nämlich allesamt falsch. Mein Flüstern sagt mir etwas völlig anderes darüber, wer hier stirbt und wie. Ich will die Überraschung nicht verderben, sagen wir also einfach, Ihr werdet sehr überrascht sein." {n}Idira grinst bösartig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case you should consider losing the eyes too, sister, 'cause your visions are all wrong. My whispers are telling me something completely different about who dies here and how. I won't spoil the surprise, so let's just say it will come as quite a shock to you." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann solltet Ihr überlegen, auch die Augen loszuwerden, Schwester, Eure Visionen sind nämlich allesamt falsch. Mein Flüstern sagt mir etwas völlig anderes darüber, wer hier stirbt und wie. Ich will die Überraschung nicht verderben, sagen wir also einfach, Ihr werdet sehr überrascht sein." {n}Idira grinst bösartig.{/n}

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, vous devriez penser à perdre la vue vous aussi, ma sœur... parce que vos visions sont tout ce qu'il y a de plus fausses. Mes murmures me disent quelque chose de bien différent à propos de ceux qui meurent ici. Je ne vous gâcherai pas la surprise, disons simplement que ça risque de vous faire un choc. » {n}Idira lui lance un sourire malicieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case you should consider losing the eyes too, sister, 'cause your visions are all wrong. My whispers are telling me something completely different about who dies here and how. I won't spoil the surprise, so let's just say it will come as quite a shock to you." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, vous devriez penser à perdre la vue vous aussi, ma sœur... parce que vos visions sont tout ce qu'il y a de plus fausses. Mes murmures me disent quelque chose de bien différent à propos de ceux qui meurent ici. Je ne vous gâcherai pas la surprise, disons simplement que ça risque de vous faire un choc. » {n}Idira lui lance un sourire malicieux.{/n}

languages.text: “老实说，你应该把你自己的眼睛也戳瞎，姐妹，因为你看到的未来全都错了。到底谁会死，会怎么死，我那些小小的低语告诉了我截然不同的事实。不过，我不打算剧透这个惊喜。所以，我只能说，它一定会让你大吃一惊。”{n}伊迪拉咧开嘴，露出了恶毒的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case you should consider losing the eyes too, sister, 'cause your visions are all wrong. My whispers are telling me something completely different about who dies here and how. I won't spoil the surprise, so let's just say it will come as quite a shock to you." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “老实说，你应该把你自己的眼睛也戳瞎，姐妹，因为你看到的未来全都错了。到底谁会死，会怎么死，我那些小小的低语告诉了我截然不同的事实。不过，我不打算剧透这个惊喜。所以，我只能说，它一定会让你大吃一惊。”{n}伊迪拉咧开嘴，露出了恶毒的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: 「それなら、自分の目を手放すことも考えたらどう、お姉さん。あなたのビジョンはすべて間違いだもの。あたいに届く囁きは、ここで誰がどう死ぬか、まったく違う風に話しているわ。サプライズを壊したくないし、あなたはとてもショックを受ける、とだけ言っておくわね」{n}イディラは意地悪く微笑む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case you should consider losing the eyes too, sister, 'cause your visions are all wrong. My whispers are telling me something completely different about who dies here and how. I won't spoil the surprise, so let's just say it will come as quite a shock to you." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、自分の目を手放すことも考えたらどう、お姉さん。あなたのビジョンはすべて間違いだもの。私に聞こえる囁きは、ここで誰がどう死ぬか、まったく違う風に話しているわ。サプライズを壊したくないし、あなたはとてもショックを受ける、とだけ言っておくわね」{n}イディラは意地悪く微笑む。{/n}

languages.text: «En ese caso deberías plantearte perder los ojos también, hermana, porque tus visiones son todas erróneas. Mis susurros me dicen algo completamente diferente sobre quién muere aquí y cómo. No voy a estropearte la sorpresa, así que digamos que te va a resultar electrizante». {n}Idira sonríe maliciosamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case you should consider losing the eyes too, sister, 'cause your visions are all wrong. My whispers are telling me something completely different about who dies here and how. I won't spoil the surprise, so let's just say it will come as quite a shock to you." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso deberías plantearte perder los ojos también, hermana, porque tus visiones son todas erróneas. Mis susurros me dicen algo completamente diferente sobre quién muere aquí y cómo. No voy a estropearte la sorpresa, así que digamos que te va a resultar electrizante». {n}Idira sonríe maliciosamente.{/n}

languages.text: "Öyleyse kendi gözlerinden kurtulmayı da düşünebilirsin rahibe. Zira görülerin tamamen yanlış. Fısıltılarım bana, burada kimin nasıl öleceği hakkında bambaşka şeyler söylüyor. Sürprizi bozmak istemem, o yüzden seni oldukça şaşırtacağını söyleyeyim yeter." {n}İdira kötü kötü sırıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case you should consider losing the eyes too, sister, 'cause your visions are all wrong. My whispers are telling me something completely different about who dies here and how. I won't spoil the surprise, so let's just say it will come as quite a shock to you." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse kendi gözlerinden kurtulmayı da düşünebilirsin rahibe. Zira görülerin tamamen yanlış. Fısıltılarım bana, burada kimin, nasıl öleceği hakkında bambaşka şeyler söylüyor. Sürprizi bozmak istemem ancak seni oldukça şaşırtacağından adım kadar eminim." {n}İdira hasımca sırıtıyor.{/n}
